fields.name: slug
fields.label: URL Slug
fields.description: Used in the product URL (e.g., 'savage' for /shop/savage)

fields.name: tagline
fields.label: Tagline
fields.description: Short catchy phrase for the product

fields.name: middle
fields.label: Heart/Middle Notes
fields.description: Main body of the fragrance (2-4 hours)

fields.name: best_for
fields.label: Best For
fields.description: Occasions or situations where this product shines

fields.name: featured
fields.label: Featured Product
fields.description: Show this product in featured sections

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
